YES IT WORKS,as all recent releases.
You have to do this:

1-Unrar
2-Mount
3-Turn off internet (take off cable or shut wireless)
4-Install
5-Open game and DONT create new profile
6-Use existing russian profile
7-Only can play in local
If you ever run the game with internet ON then you are not able to play it again.Need new instalment.
Follow this steps and everything runs well.
Cheers.

For those who cannot get it to works,follow these steps:
1.remove ny previous installatio using a good uninstaller.
2.reinstall the game.
3.run the game.(if u r using windows 7,ur firewall automatically asks whether u want to allow it to connect or not,so just cancel it)
4.in configure-- select single profile.
5.press on advanced-- go to networks tab..uncheck (check internet connection)
6.play the game.
SOLO and Multi would not work..they require an internet connection.

You can only play Local-- campaigns.
and yup,disconnect from the internet everytym b4 you start the game.

Instructions before installing the game:
1. Go to this folder:- c:\Windows\System32\drivers\etc\
Open the hosts file with notepad and add these to the end of the host file:
127.0.0.1 mp02.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp01.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp03.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 game.maniaplanet.com
Save the Host file.
2. Install the game
3. Select â€œStay offlineâ€ Then please choose the profile â€œtrackmaniacaâ€ then click on â€œLOCAL PLAYâ€ and â€œSINGLE MAPâ€, choose one map and then play.

@paketep:
The guy's German is pretty bad, but I tried translating it:

"I'm not sure if all of these steps are necessary, but it works for me.

Software:
NEXT-Soft Hex-Editor MX
Cheat Engine 6.1
Trackmania 2 Canyon Offline Profile (Copy it somewhere else for editing)

1. Open ultra.profil.Gbx with the hex editor.
2. There are 2 entries with of the name. In this case at the first profile, which comes with the installation; "trackmaniaca". Edit the first entry somewhat (I only changed one character) and save the file. Copy it into the profile folder (\TrackManiaInstall\1\Config)
3. Start TM2 and log in, then alt+tab to Windows.
4. Open the hex editor and edit the second entry just like the first one. Save and copy into the profile folder again.
5. Start Cheat Engine, select the Trackmania process and return to the game. Click on Profile (bottom left) and return to the main menu.
6. Alt+tab again.
7. In Cheat Engine, select Value Type Text and enter the name of the profile: "trackmaniaca" and tick unicode. Now click on Search.
8. Take down all the entries and change them to the name you entered in the hex editor.
9. Untick unicode and search again.
10. Take all the entries again, edit them and return to the game.
11. Exit the game. The entered name should now appear once you restart the game and you can log in.

If you get an error message about the key when logging in, you did something wrong."

Bare in mind, I haven't tried any of this so I don't really know what he's talking about. Hope it helps though.

Ok, it works. The Hex Editor steps are not needed. Just:

1) Launch the game. Enter and exit profile.
2) Launch cheat engine. Look for instances of "trackmaniaca" in memory. Should be about 20 in unicode and 12 in standard encoding.
3) Change ALL of them to any other name. It's VERY IMPORTANT that the name must still be 12 characters, in small letters
4) Exit the game

That should be enough. The next time you launch the game, the name of the profile should be changed, and there will be no problem playing with other people using the same profile with changed names.

Thanks again to monorus, and to lolol934 in the forum I linked!

Guys leave Hamachi and come to Tunngle. Its the same as Hamachi but it has its own servers so you dont have to allways post your hamachi network and etc and that way everybody plays together in 1 trackmania 2 server!

Here I leave the main steps of the tutorial:

1 - Download Tunngle
2 - Register on Tunngle website
3 - Install the program and log on: (this program will install a "new network card" that its the virtual network you need to play. Choose it as a home network with Internet access when windows ask about it)
4 - Within the program you will see a list of servers: go to Sports -> Trackmania 2 Canyon
5 - Already in the area of the chat, on the top right there is a button with a "?". Click on it and follow the tutorial to connect to the server and make some modifications in the game (like patching the profile "trackmaniaca"). In order to play online you have to do this!
6 - After doing that tutorial enter the game with the internet on (if you blocked the game on the firewall or other program please disable that).
7 - Now go to Local Play -> Local Network and you should have some servers there (maybe only a couple but you can create you're own if you want). When i played there was 2 servers with 8 players in 1 of them.
8 - Join and have fun!

"Pour que le jeux fonctionne, vous devez suivre ces etapes tres precisement :

1) Montez l'image !
2) Installez le jeux imperativement sur le disque C:/ (Systeme)
3) Ne lancez surtout pas le jeu de suite !
4) Editez le fichier "hosts" qui se trouve dans "C:/Windows/System32/drivers/etc" et y inserer ces 4 lignes a la suite des autres :

127.0.0.1 mp02.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp01.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 mp03.maniaplanet.com
127.0.0.1 game.maniaplanet.com

5) Lancez maintenant le jeux avec le raccourcis. Un test de performance vous ai demandez, accepter.
Une fois ceci le jeux sera en anglais, allez dans "Configure" pour changer la langue et cliquez sur "Sauvegarder".

6) Cliquez sur "JOUER" pour lancer le jeu. (Sur Windows 7, autoriser le programme dans le pare-feu).

7) Une fois que le jeu se lance, normalement il va essayer de se connecter a Maniaplanet et n'y parviendra pas suivi d'un message 
d'erreur "Impossible de se connecter au serveur ! (12029)" cliquez sur "OK" puis ensuite sur "RESTE DECONNECTE".

8) Selectionnez le profil "trackmaniaca", chargement des maps et autres...

9) Une fois sur le menu, pour jouer faite "JEU LOCAL" puis "MAP UNIQUE" et differentes MAPS du jeu y sont presentent dans le dossier "CAMPAIGN" plus des MAP MOD dans le dossier "MY MAPS".

BON JEU & AMUSEZ VOUS BIEN !!! :)"
